Title: The Fickle Spaniard
Actors: Mabel Normand, Fred Mace, Claire McDowell
Plot: To Marcel, the little Spanish senorita, he swears eternal love, only to fall, later, a victim to the charms of Margot. Marcel sees their meeting while she is shaving her father, an accomplishment she had to acquire because of her father's arm being disabled. Well, in a moment her fiery temper bursts forth and she dashes after the perfidious Spaniard, who runs to cover in his house. However, she swears to be avenged, and her time comes, but how, we would rather let you see than tell.
